name: Pyramid VR
description: Classic text based adventure brought to VR life!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Core i5 3500 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
